name: CatAclysme (Kallysto)
description:
This is our project of point & click that we made in a bit more than 24 hours on a week-end.  CAUTION : It's in french for now, but we are planning to translate it !

Here is the team :

- Darius Guernet & Théo Verpillat, Game Designers

- Horace Ribout, Programmer

- Perrine Pau, Graphic Designer

- Jérémy Guarober, Sound Designer

- Constance Gautier, Project Leader
